articles.title: The U.S. Has Had a Million 'Extra' Deaths Since the Pandemic Began - Gizmodo

articles.title: Americans go 0-for-5 in shootout, fall to Slovakia in men's Olympic hockey quarterfinals - ESPN
articles.description: Slovakia stunned Team USA in their Olympic men's ice hockey quarterfinal on Wednesday, tying the game in the final minute of regulation and then eliminating the tournament's top seed in a shootout.
